Text: Sorry, I must pass on this one... I am no jew boy but reading this stuff depresses me and makes me hate human nature (nazi bastards). Too strong for me...
This stuff is fiction you a-hole.
If you want to read about a TRUE holocaust, see what the Zionist jew having been doing to the Native Palestinians for the last 70 years in APARTHEID israel.

It is true the state of Israel (not the worldwide jews) whose government yields to the extreme orthodox there has been very unfair to the palestinians stealing their land they took in 1967 and killing many BUT TO COMPARE that to the holocaust with millions of jews deliberately, meticulously, murdered in cold blood by the nazis in WW2 is such a monstrous LIE that only neo-nazi turds say that today.

hey zakimar, fuck you im jewish and the great grandchild of  nazi survives. If the Palestinians, really wanted peace they wouldnt have cartoons and militant mickey mouse characters encouraging suicide bombings.

Actually, now I recognize these books. They are NOT novels or fiction but reality, one the testimony of a jewish doctor who had to work under Mengele, another how the movie Schindler's List was conceived and done, another the true horror experienced  by a survivor. Good but hard reading.
